Description: Wrap app in MaterialTheme for consistent theming
Do: Use MaterialTheme with colorScheme typography shapes
Don't: Use hardcoded colors and text styles

Description: Use dynamic color schemes from wallpaper
Don't: Force dynamic color on older devices

Description: Prefer Material 3 components over Material 2
Don't: Mix Material 2 and Material 3 components

Description: NavHost manages navigation graph and back stack
Don't: Create custom navigation state management

Description: Use type-safe navigation arguments
Don't: Pass data through viewmodels or globals

Description: remember survives recomposition but not config changes
Do: Use remember for UI state that can be recreated
Don't: Use remember for data that must survive rotation
Code Bad: val userData = remember { loadUserData() } // lost on rotation

Description: rememberSaveable survives configuration changes
Do: Use rememberSaveable for user input scroll position
Don't: Use rememberSaveable for large objects

Description: Lift state up to make composables stateless reusable
Do: Create stateless composables accept state as params
Don't: Keep state internal to composables
Code Bad: @Composable fun Counter() { var count by remember { mutableStateOf(0) } }

Description: Collect Flows as Compose state safely
Don't: Collect flows without lifecycle awareness

Description: LazyColumn only composes visible items
Do: Use LazyColumn with key parameter for stable items
Don't: Use Column with verticalScroll for long lists

Guideline: Provide stable keys for list items
Description: Stable keys help Compose track item identity
Do: Use unique stable IDs as keys
Don't: Use index as key or omit keys

Description: animateAsState handles animation lifecycle
Don't: Manually manage animation state
Code Bad: var alpha by remember { mutableStateOf(1f) }; LaunchedEffect(visible) { animate... }

Description: Transition coordinates multiple animated values
Do: Use updateTransition for related property animations
Don't: Create separate animations for related properties
Code Good: val transition = updateTransition(selected); val color by transition.animateColor { }; val size by transition.animateDp { }
Code Bad: val color by animateColorAsState(); val size by animateDpAsState()

Description: Screen readers need descriptions for images
Don't: Leave contentDescription null for meaningful images

Description: Provide accessibility info for custom UI
Don't: Skip semantics on interactive custom views

Description: derivedStateOf caches computation until dependencies change
Don't: Compute derived values in composition
Code Good: val filteredList by remember { derivedStateOf { list.filter { it.active } } }
Code Bad: val filteredList = list.filter { it.active } // recomputes every recomposition

Guideline: Use stable types for compose stability
Description: Compose can skip recomposition of stable composables
Don't: Pass mutable lists or unstable types

Description: Android 14+ shows back destination preview
Do: Use PredictiveBackHandler for custom back animations
Don't: Block back gestures without handling

Description: Draw behind system bars for immersive experience
Don't: Use fixed padding for system bars

Description: Adjust layout when keyboard appears
Don't: Ignore keyboard covering content

Description: BOM ensures compatible Compose library versions
Do: Import Compose BOM align library versions
Don't: Specify individual version for each library

Description: Navigation 2.8+ supports type-safe routes
Don't: Use string routes with manual parsing
Code Good: @Serializable data class Detail(val id: String) NavHost { composable<Detail> { } }

Description: Automatic navigation rail/bar/drawer switching
Don't: Manually switch between NavigationBar and NavigationRail

Description: Determine layout based on available width
Don't: Use fixed width checks for layout decisions

Description: ComposeTestRule provides testing utilities
Don't: Test composables without ComposeTestRule

Description: Find elements by semantics for reliable tests
Don't: Use visual position for test assertions
Code Bad: // find button at position x y

Description: Add custom colors while keeping M3 tokens
Do: Use CompositionLocal for custom theme extensions
Don't: Hardcode custom colors in composables

Description: Launch coroutines tied to composable lifecycle
Do: Use LaunchedEffect with keys for scoped effects
Don't: Launch coroutines in composition without effect

Description: Register callbacks that need cleanup
Do: Use DisposableEffect with onDispose for cleanup
Don't: Register listeners without cleanup

Description: Modifier order affects behavior and performance
Do: Apply size before other modifiers use clickable after clip
Don't: Apply clickable before clip for wrong hit area

Description: PreviewView handles aspect ratio, scale, and rotation
Do: Use PreviewView or CameraViewfinder with a scaleType
Don't: Stretch SurfaceView or bitmap frames

Description: Avoid fixed orientation and adapt preview/control layout
Do: Use WindowSizeClass and split preview and controls on large screens
Don't: Assume portrait-only or fixed window size

Description: graphicsLayer enables efficient transformations
Do: Use graphicsLayer for scale rotation alpha
Don't: Use Modifier.scale rotate alpha separately
